subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dewayne Wise leapt into history alongside Sandy Amoros, Ron Swoboda and Willie Mays when he jumped to catch a ball that preserved Mark Buehrle’s perfect game.
snippet: Dewayne Wise leapt into history alongside Sandy Amoros, Ron Swoboda and Willie Mays when he jumped to catch a ball that preserved Mark Buehrle’s perfect game.
